item.description:
A remarkable device has been discovered in the wastes near the city-state of Tyr â€“ a magical cistern created by a long-dead preserver named Aravek. You are charged to journey through the harsh desert lands, brave fierce monsters, and retrieve the cistern before your enemies can claim it for their own cruel master. Can you bring a font of life-giving water to a parched populace? Or will you succumb to dangers beyond the gates of Tyr? A Dark Sun adventure for 4-6 pregenerated 4th-level characters.

Children 6-10; 6pm-8pm
Teens and Adults; 6pm-9:30pm
item.name: Worldwide D&D Game Day: The Lost Cistern of Aravek
